name: Limited Rescue
description:
Chaotic local multiplayer

Throw your friends in the lava and be the last survivor when the rescue finally comes.
Fast and intuitive gameplay, up to 6 players on the same screen.

Use different spells to be successful

Choose and cast devastating spells.
More than 10 different spells already available !

Super fast learning

All you need is an analog stick and 4 buttons to turn your friends in smoking roasts. Limited Rescue is very intuitive but it takes practise to truly master the elements !

Free for all or in teams

Limited Rescue already offers 3 different game modes so that you can bbq your friends alone or in teams.


The game can be played with a keyboard but we highly recommend the use of gamepads (xbox, PS4, ...) to better enjoy the experience.
Limited Rescue is "Remote Play" compatible --> Only one of you needs to buy the game and is then able to invite the whole squad to join through Steam, even remotely.
